intro: Natrix rotundifolia, commonly known as the smooth water snake, is a species of aquatic snake found in freshwater habitats across Europe. It has a slender body with a distinctive smooth, glossy scale pattern that helps it blend into its environment. The plant associated with this snake, though not a plant itself, is often found in the same wetland areas where the snake resides.
